snippet.title: Trailer - Power of Petanque
snippet.description:
Available on Steam end of July 2024.

Store page : 
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2075480/Power_of_Petanque/

Compete against your friends in the traditional sport of petanque to determine who is the master of petanque.
A simple and intuitive game, throw your ball to be closest to the jack. The furthest players take damage until they are eliminated.
Use various magical powers to gain an advantage over your opponents and turn the tide of the game. The last one standing wins!
Compete against your friends alone or in a team.
